[CENTER][IMG]http://evolved-pk.com/home/bin/images/newlogo.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://evolved-pk.com/home/"]Home[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://evolved-pk.com/forum/"]Forums[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://evolved-pk.com/vote/"]Vote[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://evolved-pk.com/hiscores/"]Hiscores[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://evolved-pk.com/play/Evolved.jar"]Play Now[/URL]
STAFF WANTED 24/7 ONLINE BRAND NEW SERVER BRILLIANT ECO PERFECT COMBAT CUSTOM DONATOR BOSSES GAMBLING QUESTS AND ACHIEVEMENTS JOIN NOW!
FEATURES
Active Playerbase Dedicated and experienced Developers Fully functioning Grand Exchange Stable Economy Automated Hiscores, Vote, Donation System 100% Functioning Iron Man mode with crowns & rewards Wilderness Bosses, Runescape Bosses, New Boss Every Week Bosses: General Graardor, Kree'Arra, Commander Zilyana, K'ril Tsutsaroth, Dagannoth Prime, Dagannoth Rex, Dagannoth Supreme, Frost Dragons, Tormented Demons, King Black Dragon, Chaos Elemental, Slash Bash, Nomad, Kalphite Queen (2 stages), Phoenix, Bandos Avatar, Glacors, Corporeal Beast, Nex. Minigames: Warriors Guild, Pest Control, Duel Arena, Barrows, TzHaar Fight Cave, TzHaar Fight Pit, Graveyard Arena, RFD, Nomad's Requeim. Dicing for all Flawless Clan Chat with LS Duo Slayer Advanced Client: (Resizable, Fullscreen, Switching Gameframes, Cursors, Tooltips, Absorption, Hitsplats, Smilies, HD Textures, Input Save, Censors, Fog, Zoom in/out, Bank Tabs, Low Memory Usage) Large, Dedicated Staff Team Summoning & Dungeoneering w/ parties 100+ Achievements 24/7 Uptime Click any skill to begin training it within seconds IPB Forum
